p: From the docking results in the allosteric site ( Table 4, Figure 5, Figures S4–S7 in the Supplementary Materials), noticeable protein–ligand interactions are with Lys 5, which is next to Arg 4, an essential residue for the dimerization process [ 11]. The other interacting residues (Lys 137, Gly 138, Glu 290, Tyr 126 and Leu 286) are in accordance with those found from the biological assembly in PDB 6LU7 ( Table S1 in the Supplementary Materials).
